message: MutualMobile (http://www.mutualmobile.com/) is in Austin. They're doing good stuff and growing fast.

It seems like all of the positions posted on job boards are either temp work or are through an IT staffing company. Where are the actual full time positions? I do not live in an ideal place to be looking (West Texas), but I am open to relocating for a position if I found one. I would have thought there would be more around the Dallas area, but everything I come across comes from an agency that reposts the same ads month after month - most of which do not ever respond to any messages. I noticed people in this group discussed interviews and jobs, but how did you find a company to interview with in the first place?
There's also Appiction (http://www.appiction.com/) in Austin, but I'm not really familiar with anything that they've done.
